instructions: put the dinner plate in the middle of the table cloth, towards the bottom
put the salad plate on top of the dinner plate
put the napkin on top of the salad plate
put the wine glass on the top right hand side of the table cloth
put the water glass to the bottom right of the wine glass
put the salad fork on the left of the dinner plate
put the dinner fork on the right of the salad fork
put the dinner knife on the right of the dinner plate
put the soup spoon on the right of the dinner knife
